metadata.title: CVE-2022-43252 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Libde265 v1.0.8 was discovered to contain a heap-buffer-overflowvulnerability via put_epel_16_fallback in fallback-motion.cc. Thisvulnerability allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) via acrafted video file.

criterions.comment: libde265: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
